EasyForm.Name: InitializeGroupForm
EasyForm.Title: Initialize User Groups
EasyForm.Description: Please initialize system groups setting for fit your company's situation.

Element.Name: fld_rename_default_group
Element.Label: Rename Group
Element.Description: Rename system [b]Default Group[/b] to a new name

Element.Name: fld_rename_default_group_name
Element.Label: Default Group
Element.Description: Rename system default group to this name

Element.Description: Rename it to fit for your company
